products.name: Raw Honey
products.shortDesc: Our raw honey is sold in 500g, 1kg, and 3kg quantities.  Larger quantities are also available upon request.

products.name: Nucs/Colonies
products.shortDesc: Nuc availability is seasonally dependent.  Our nucs contain 1 year old locally mated Buckfast queens.

products.name: Beeswax
products.shortDesc: Our beeswax is melted, strained, cleaned, and ready for use. Beeswax is sold by the pound.

products.name: Pollen
products.shortDesc: Bee pollen harvest from our hives is fresh/frozen and sold by the pound.

products.name: Urban Beekeeping
products.shortDesc: Beekeeping It Real is happy to be able to offer rental hives to suit your needs.
products.longDesc: This gives you the chance to produce honey at home/work in a responsible and intriguing way.  With multiple packages available there is one to suit everyone's needs. Please contact Dave at dave@beekeepingitreal.ca to discuss your bee needs and wants in order to get your bee hive up and running.
